msContents.summary: Small manuscript for private use, recitation, and prayer, dedicated to praising the goddess of smallpox Śītalā (the cooling one) in order to ward of disease. Contains 12 verses of text. Back of manuscript used for scribal practice, especially the akṣaras (syllables) "da" and "dha."
